translations.Smart media tagging and face recognition: Smart media tagging and face recognition with on-premises machine learning models
translations.Your server does not support AVX instruc: Your server does not support AVX instructions
translations.Your server does not have an x86 64-bit: Your server does not have an x86 64-bit CPU
translations.The machine learning models have been do: The machine learning models have been downloaded successfully.
translations.The machine learning models still need t: The machine learning models still need to be downloaded.
translations.Could not execute the Node.js binary. Yo: Could not execute the Node.js binary. You may need to set the path to a working binary manually.
translations.Background Jobs are not executed via cro: Background Jobs are not executed via cron. Recognize requires background jobs to be executed via cron.
translations.The app is installed and will automatica: The app is installed and will automatically classify files in background processes.
translations.None of the tagging options below are cu: None of the tagging options below are currently selected. The app will currently do nothing.
translations.An error occurred during face recognitio: An error occurred during face recognition, please check the Nextcloud logs.
translations.Waiting for status reports on face recog: Waiting for status reports on face recognition. If this message persists beyond 15 minutes, please check the Nextcloud logs.
translations.There are queued files in the face recog: There are queued files in the face recognition queue but no background job is scheduled to process them.
translations.A minimum of 120 faces per user is neces: A minimum of 120 faces per user is necessary for clustering to kick in
translations.Enable face recognition (groups photos b: Enable face recognition (groups photos by faces that appear in them; UI is in the photos app)
translations.The number of files to process per job r: The number of files to process per job run (A job will be scheduled every 5 minutes; For normal operation ~500 or more, in WASM mode ~50 is recommended)
translations.An error occurred during object recognit: An error occurred during object recognition, please check the Nextcloud logs.
translations.Waiting for status reports on object rec: Waiting for status reports on object recognition. If this message persists beyond 15 minutes, please check the Nextcloud logs.
translations.There are queued files in the object det: There are queued files in the object detection queue but no background job is scheduled to process them.
translations.An error occurred during landmark recogn: An error occurred during landmark recognition, please check the Nextcloud logs.
translations.Waiting for status reports on landmark r: Waiting for status reports on landmark recognition. If this message persists beyond 15 minutes, please check the Nextcloud logs.
translations.There are queued files in the landmarks: There are queued files in the landmarks queue but no background job is scheduled to process them.
translations.Enable object recognition (e.g. food, ve: Enable object recognition (e.g. food, vehicles, landscapes)
translations.The number of files to process per job r: The number of files to process per job run (A job will be scheduled every 5 minutes; For normal operation ~100 or more, in WASM mode ~20 is recommended)
translations.Enable landmark recognition (e.g. Eiffel: Enable landmark recognition (e.g. Eiffel Tower, Golden Gate Bridge)
translations.An error occurred during audio recogniti: An error occurred during audio recognition, please check the Nextcloud logs.
translations.Waiting for status reports on audio reco: Waiting for status reports on audio recognition. If this message persists beyond 15 minutes, please check the Nextcloud logs.
translations.There are queued files but no background: There are queued files but no background job is scheduled to process them.
translations.Enable music genre recognition (e.g. pop: Enable music genre recognition (e.g. pop, rock, folk, metal, new age)
translations.An error occurred during video recogniti: An error occurred during video recognition, please check the Nextcloud logs.
translations.Waiting for status reports on video reco: Waiting for status reports on video recognition. If this message persists beyond 15 minutes, please check the Nextcloud logs.
translations.Enable human action recognition (e.g. ar: Enable human action recognition (e.g. arm wrestling, dribbling basketball, hula hooping)
translations.The number of files to process per job r: The number of files to process per job run (A job will be scheduled every 5 minutes; For normal operation ~20 or more, in WASM mode ~5 is recommended)
translations.Click the button below to remove all tag: Click the button below to remove all tags from all files that have been classified so far.
translations.Click the button below to remove all fac: Click the button below to remove all face detections from all files that have been classified so far.
translations.Click the button below to rescan all fil: Click the button below to rescan all files in this instance and add them to the classifier queues.
translations.Click the button below to clear the clas: Click the button below to clear the classifier queues and clear all background jobs. This is useful when you want to do the initial classification using the terminal command.
translations.By default all available CPU cores will: By default all available CPU cores will be used which may put your system under considerable load. To avoid this, you can limit the amount of CPU Cores used. (Note: In WASM mode, currently only 1 core can be used at all times.)
translations.Number of CPU Cores (0 for no limit): Number of CPU Cores (0 for no limit)
translations.Could not check whether your machine sup: Could not check whether your machine supports native TensorFlow operation. Make sure your OS has GNU lib C, your CPU supports AVX instructions and you are running on x86. If one of these things is not the case, you will need to run in WASM mode.
translations.Your machine supports native TensorFlow: Your machine supports native TensorFlow operation, you do not need WASM mode.
translations.WASM mode was activated automatically, b: WASM mode was activated automatically, because your machine does not support native TensorFlow operation:
translations.Recognize uses Tensorflow for running th: Recognize uses Tensorflow for running the machine learning models. Not all installations support Tensorflow, either because the CPU does not support AVX instructions, or because the platform is not x86 (ie. on a Raspberry Pi, which is ARM), or because the Operating System that your nextcloud runs on (when using docker, then that is the OS within the docker image) does not come with GNU lib C (for example Alpine Linux, which is also used by Nextcloud AIO). In most cases, even if your installation does not support native Tensorflow operation, you can still run Tensorflow using WebAssembly (WASM) in Node.js. This is somewhat slower but still works.
translations.Like most machine learning models, Recog: Like most machine learning models, Recognize will run even faster when using a GPU. Setting this up is non-trivial but works well when everything is setup correctly.
translations.Learn how to setup GPU mode with Recogni: Learn how to setup GPU mode with Recognize
Could not load libtensorflow in Node.js. You can try to manually install libtensorflow or run in WASM mode.
translations.Successfully loaded libtensorflow in Nod: Successfully loaded libtensorflow in Node.js, but couldn't load GPU. Make sure CUDA Toolkit and cuDNN are installed and accessible, or turn off GPU mode.
translations.Libtensorflow was loaded successfully in: Libtensorflow was loaded successfully into Node.js.
translations.Could not load Tensorflow WASM in Node.j: Could not load Tensorflow WASM in Node.js. Something is wrong with your setup.
translations.Tensorflow WASM was loaded successfully: Tensorflow WASM was loaded successfully into Node.js.
translations.Could not find the Nice binary. You may: Could not find the Nice binary. You may need to set the path to a working binary manually.
translations.Nice value to set the priority of the No: Nice value to set the priority of the Node.js processes. The value can only be from 0 to 19 since the Node.js process runs without superuser privileges. The higher the nice value, the lower the priority of the process.
translations.To download all models preliminary to ex: To download all models preliminary to executing the classification jobs, run the following command on the server terminal.
translations.To trigger a full classification run, ru: To trigger a full classification run, run the following command on the server terminal. (The classification will run in multiple background jobs which can run in parallel.)
translations.To run a full classification run on the: To run a full classification run on the terminal, run the following. (The classification will run in sequence inside your terminal.)
translations.Before running a full initial classifica: Before running a full initial classification run on the terminal, you should stop all background processing that Recognize scheduled upon installation to avoid interference.
